mapper.insert: insert into customer (cuID, customerName, customerPsd, customerSex, Birthday, Tel, Address, Comment) values (#{cuID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update customer set customerName = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerPsd = #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerSex = #{customerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cuID = #{cuID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cuID, customerName, customerPsd, customerSex, Birthday, Tel, Address, Comment from customer
